name: Smoothies are organised into categories based on their number of calories

testSteps.description: Example #1: {Category=Under 200, Smoothie=Apple and Kale, Calories=160, Flames=1, Range=Healthy}

children.description: When a Apple and Kale smoothie contains 160 calories
Then it should be classed as a 1 flame smoothie in the Healthy range

testSteps.description: Example #2: {Category=Under 300, Smoothie=Orange and Yogurt, Calories=240, Flames=2, Range=Healthy}

children.description: When a Orange and Yogurt smoothie contains 240 calories
Then it should be classed as a 2 flame smoothie in the Healthy range

testSteps.description: Example #3: {Category=Under 400, Smoothie=Triple Berry Blend, Calories=380, Flames=3, Range=Indulgent}

children.description: When a Triple Berry Blend smoothie contains 380 calories
Then it should be classed as a 3 flame smoothie in the Indulgent range

testSteps.description: Example #4: {Category=400 or more, Smoothie=Strawberry Special, Calories=490, Flames=4, Range=Indulgent}

children.description: When a Strawberry Special smoothie contains 490 calories
Then it should be classed as a 4 flame smoothie in the Indulgent range

userStory.narrative:
Morning Freshness wants to attract health-conscious customers by proposing options to help smoothie buyers
  know if a smoothie is in line with their diet plans.

  With the 'diet-friendly' mode, Morning Freshness members can buy smoothies knowing that they are not threatening their diet plans.
  We hope this will encourage people on diets, or health-conscious customers in general, prefer Morning Freshness as a smoothie provider.

title: Smoothies are organised into categories based on their number of calories
description:
Each category is represented by a number of "flames" - the more "flames" the smoothie has,
  the more calories it contains.

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
When a <Smoothie> smoothie contains <Calories> calories
Then it should be classed as a <Flames> flame smoothie in the <Range> range

dataSetDescriptors.name: Healthy smoothie options
dataSetDescriptors.description: Smoothies under 300 calories are classed as 'Healthy'

dataSetDescriptors.name: Indulgent smoothie options
dataSetDescriptors.description: Smoothies with 300 or more calories are classed as 'Indulgent'

scenarioOutline:

Then it should be classed as a <Flames> flame smoothie in the <Range> range
